Description: CloudWatch Dashboards to visualize Elastic File System (EFS) resources. Both dashboards leverage Dashboard Variables to filter on the desired resources. Dashboard 'EFS_All_Resources' visualizes ALL EFS resources in the target region. Dashboard 'EFS_Individual_Resources' provides additional filters to isolate a specific file system.

DefaultRegion.Description: Select the default region hosting the file systems to be monitored.

DefaultEFS.Description: Select the default file system to be monitored. (e.g. fs-0123456789abcdefg)
